claims: The company is seeking $1.2M in funding.
A patent has been granted for its technology.
Ctruh is described as the 'Worldâ€™s First AI-Powered Unified XR Commerce Studio'.
The platform features a proprietary no-code 3D engine for web-based XR.
Its VersaAI engine generates 3D assets from text or image inputs.
The AI Product Scanner converts 2D images into 3D models in under 30 seconds.
The platform offers real-time rendering, a feature most listed competitors lack.
The virtual 'Smart Try-On' feature does not require an app download.
Ctruh provides multi-platform support for web, mobile, and headsets.
The studio includes a drag-and-drop builder for virtual stores and showrooms.
